abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would seek to
            establish a replicable long-term credit delivery system and
            increase agricultural production, incomes and employment
            opportunities in the rural areas. The main emphasis would be
            the provision of credit to farmers' groups and farmers
            for the installation of shallow tubewells. The proposed
            project would also finance other diversified lending
            including grain storage; credit for the equipment of
            workshops and village mechanics to improve the maintenance
            facilities for irrigation equipment; and funds for technical
            assistance and training.
